channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: In U.N. vote, countries show willingness to move away from fossil fuels
item.description: The body's call to speed up a transition from fossil fuels is part of a pact designed to bring countries together to tackle challenges in the 21st century.
item.content:encoded:
The body's call to speed up a transition from fossil fuels is part of a pact designed to bring countries together to tackle challenges in the 21st century.

(Image credit: Timothy A. Clary)
item.dc:creator: Juliana Kim

item.title: Speaker Johnson announces plan to keep the government funded until Dec. 20
item.description: The measure does not include any part of the SAVE Act, the election security proposal backed by former President Donald Trump.
item.content:encoded:
The measure does not include any part of the SAVE Act, the election security proposal backed by former President Donald Trump.

(Image credit: Win McNamee/Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Claudia Grisales

item.title: After a week of attacks, Lebanon braces for more
item.description: After a week of unprecedented Israeli attacks in Lebanon and Hezbollah counterattacks, Lebanon is bracing for more attacks to come.
item.content:encoded: After a week of unprecedented Israeli attacks in Lebanon and Hezbollah counterattacks, Lebanon is bracing for more attacks to come.
item.dc:creator: Jane Arraf

item.title: Tufts University lacrosse players hospitalized for days after workout
item.description: Tufts University says it has launched an investigation after members of the men's lacrosse team were diagnosed with a dangerous medical condition.
item.content:encoded:
Tufts University says it has launched an investigation after members of the men's lacrosse team were diagnosed with a dangerous medical condition.

(Image credit: Eden, Janine and Jim)
item.dc:creator: Chandelis Duster

item.title: Third-party voters face a tough choice in a tight election
item.description: Single-issue voters dissatisfied with Trump and Harris consider third party candidates in tight election
item.content:encoded:
Single-issue voters dissatisfied with Trump and Harris consider third party candidates in tight election

(Image credit: Nell Redmond/AP)
item.dc:creator: Luke Garrett

item.title: Marxist Dissanayake wins Sri Lanka's presidential election as voters reject old guard
item.description: The election was crucial as the country seeks to recover from the worst economic crisis in its history and the resulting political upheaval.
item.content:encoded:
The election was crucial as the country seeks to recover from the worst economic crisis in its history and the resulting political upheaval.

(Image credit: Eranga Jayawardena)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: In one key swing state, both parties are courting Black men
item.description: With North Carolina now a toss-up this presidential election, both parties are making appeals to Black men. An older farmer and a younger restaurant owner share what's driving their votes.
item.content:encoded:
With North Carolina now a toss-up this presidential election, both parties are making appeals to Black men. An older farmer and a younger restaurant owner share what's driving their votes.

(Image credit: Melissa Gray)
item.dc:creator: Ayesha Rascoe

item.title: The human cost of ghost networks
item.description: He tried to find a therapist who would take his insurance. He did not succeed.
item.content:encoded:
He tried to find a therapist who would take his insurance. He did not succeed.

(Image credit: Webber Coutinho family)
item.dc:creator: Rhitu Chatterjee

item.title: Up against a 'ghost network' for mental health care? Here's what you can do
item.description: Insurers’ failures to update their provider directories have led to dire consequences for people seeking mental health care. Here's how you can navigate these challenges to find treatment.
item.content:encoded:
Insurers’ failures to update their provider directories have led to dire consequences for people seeking mental health care. Here's how you can navigate these challenges to find treatment.

(Image credit: Stone RF)
item.dc:creator: Max Blau

item.title: Money for cutting-edge climate technology could dry up in a second Trump term
item.description: A hydrogen plant in Utah could offer a new path to slash fossil-fuel pollution. But federal funding that was critical for projects like this one could dry up if Donald Trump is reelected.
item.content:encoded:
A hydrogen plant in Utah could offer a new path to slash fossil-fuel pollution. But federal funding that was critical for projects like this one could dry up if Donald Trump is reelected.

(Image credit: George Frey)
item.dc:creator: Michael Copley
